user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and supportive bras that are suitable for both active use and everyday wear, while also being affordable.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and supportive option for medium-impact activities. The seamless design and soft material appealed to me, as I wanted something that would allow for full movement without discomfort. The price was also a significant factor, as I found it to be a bargain compared to typical plus-size bras, which made the quality even more surprising. Overall, the combination of comfort, support, and affordability led me to make this purchase.

I needed a soft and breathable bra that could keep up with my active lifestyle. The front close design and the brand's reputation for comfort and affordability were key factors in my decision. I appreciated the guarantee offered, which gave me confidence in the purchase. The comfort level was a priority for me, and I was pleased to find a product that met my needs without breaking the bank.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, well-fitting, and made from high-quality materials. I value features such as stretchiness, breathability, and ease of maintenance, like being washable or having pockets. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be used in various settings, whether for lounging, exercising, or casual outings. Additionally, I tend to favor brands that offer good value for money and have a positive reputation for quality. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly sized, made from thin or low-quality materials, or that do not provide the comfort I expect. I also find excessive or unnecessary features unappealing, especially if they detract from the overall usability of the product.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive bras that I can wear for both active use and everyday wear without breaking the bank. within my expected price range: [10.25, 10.99]
What specific sizes or features are you looking for in the bras, such as padding, wire-free design, or specific cup styles?

I prefer bras that are wire-free and have a seamless design for comfort. I also look for options with good support for medium-impact activities. Padding is not a must-have for me, but I appreciate bras that offer a good balance between support and comfort.
"What fabric preferences do you have for the bras, such as cotton, nylon, or spandex, to ensure both comfort and support for your active and daily wear needs?"

I prefer bras made from a blend of nylon and spandex as they provide a good balance between comfort and support for my active and daily wear needs. The stretchiness of spandex ensures flexibility during movement, while the nylon adds durability and shape retention to the bras.
"What level of coverage do you prefer in the bras, such as full coverage, demi-cup, or racerback styles, to ensure they meet your comfort and support requirements for both active and daily wear?"

I prefer bras with full coverage to ensure both comfort and support for my active and daily wear needs. The full coverage style provides me with the security and confidence I need, especially for medium-impact activities.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Ultimate Underwire Bra, Low-Cut T-Shirt Bra, Convertible Underwire Bra, Convertible Underwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0C3LS6FZX / Price: $10.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Say hello to smooth comfort with Hanes®' low-cut, underwire T-shirt bra. The T-shirt-soft knit fabric virtually disappears under clingy clothes for the smooth, seamless look you want. Offering moderate coverage, its plunging front contours will be welcomed by all the different necklines in your wardrobe. The underwire construction is super comfortable and detailed with a stretch front band that helps keep the cups in place. Lightly lined foam cups have inside concealing petals for a no-show look. You'll love the moisture-wicking properties of the soft knit ComfortBlend® lining that helps keep you cool and dry. And to top it all off, the straps convert from straight traditional to racerback styling for even more fashion flexibility. There are lots of reasons that this is one of Hanes' favorite underwire T-shirt bras."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Womens Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Pullover Stretch-Knit Bra, Smoothing T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0BPCC1KBT / Price: $10.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["This wireless knit bra from Hanes® could easily become your favorite for all the ways in which it offers comfort and support. This pullover stretch bra is designed with strategic knit panels, placed to offer the support you need. The unlined cups offer natural shaping and sublime comfort, with that soft feel you love. This versatile style is made of the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric with 4-way stretch that molds to your shape. Even better, this wirefree bra also features Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. Customers tell us they wear this T-shirt bra for low-impact workouts, including yoga, and that it's so comfortable they sometimes lounge and even sleep in it. With its built-up back and wide straps, this pullover bra offers smoothing all around, and is tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Seamless Pullover Bra With Built-in Cups> / Item ID: B06XS2ZYQF / Price: $10.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Fruit of the Loom Total Comfort Bra FT662 has wire-free, lightly padded cups. Fruit of the Loom's Total Comfort Bra is made of nylon/spandex."]
